name: Ilona's Word Wise Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Jack in the box.

	Jack in the Box is a toy in which you wind the handle to make Jack pop out of a box. It is also the name of a restaurant franchise.

chip on your shoulder.

	To have a chip on your shoulder means you have an attitude problem.

questions.correct: Dime a Dozen & a dime a dozen
questions.explanation:
Dime a Dozen & a dime a dozen.

	If something is a dime a dozen it means there are a lot of that item.

questions.correct: piece of cake & a piece of cake & shortcake & short cake
questions.explanation:
piece of cake & a piece of cake & shortcake & short cake.

	A piece of the word cake was missing. Therefore the answer was piece of cake. It could also be shortcake because the word cake is short one letter.

Toss up.

	A toss up is when you have to chose between two things that you really like. It is a toss up as to which you will pick.

cut the mustard.

	If you cut the mustard you are competent to do the task.

Cry Over Spilt Milk.

	To cry over spilt milk is to get upset over something that really is not important.

questions.correct: A flash in the pan & flash in a pan & Flash in the pan &A flash in a pan
questions.explanation:
A flash in the pan & flash in a pan & Flash in the pan &A flash in a pan.

	A flash in the pan is something that looks promising in the beginning but turns out to be nothing.

Head Over Heels.

	A person is head over heels when they fall in love and are all excited about the other person.

High five & High 5.

	A person gives a high five when something good happens to another person.
